edu.nps.moves.gateway

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nps.moves.gateway.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration settings for the gateway. The default settings here can be overridden by settings in the GatewayConfiguration.properties file.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Configuration.NativeNetworkMode
      Whether to listen on the native network in multicast, or broadcast.

    • Field Detail

      • HTTP_WEBSERVER_PORT

        public static int HTTP_WEBSERVER_PORT
        The default unencrypted port the webserver listens on.

      • HTTPS_WEBSERVER_PORT

        public static int HTTPS_WEBSERVER_PORT
        HTTPS port

      • ENABLE_AOIM

        public static boolean ENABLE_AOIM
        Use area of interest managment or not

      • ENABLE_REDIS

        public static boolean ENABLE_REDIS
        Whether to run the redis server at all. If we have a single host there is no need to run a pub/sub server.

      • REDIS_SERVER

        public static java.lang.String REDIS_SERVER
        Host the redis server is running on

      • REDIS_PORT

        public static int REDIS_PORT
        Port the redis server is listening on

      • REDIS_PUB_SUB_CHANNEL

        public static java.lang.String REDIS_PUB_SUB_CHANNEL
        Pub-sub channel to use.

      • ENABLE_NATIVE_NETWORK_DIS

        public static boolean ENABLE_NATIVE_NETWORK_DIS
        Whether we should listen on the native UDP interface for DIS at all. In some instances this may be a bad idea, for example when there are no native DIS applications running on the server side, and we only want to use the websocket server to communicate between web applications.

      • NETWORK_MODE

        public static Configuration.NativeNetworkMode NETWORK_MODE
        bcast or mcast

      • DIS_PORT

        public static int DIS_PORT
        DIS port. We also listen on the server's local network interface for native DIS UDP packets on the network

      • MULTICAST_ADDRESS

        public static java.lang.String MULTICAST_ADDRESS
        Multicast address to use with multicast

    • Constructor Detail

        public Configuration()

    • Method Detail

      • setConfigurationFromProperties

        public static void setConfigurationFromProperties(java.util.Properties settings)
        The properties object passed in contains settings that override any of those set above. The properties file is read at startup and passed here. The name is GatewayConfiguration.properties.
        Parameters:
        settings -
